Class NumberInputNodeRenderer

Namespace
FlowGraph.Avalonia.Rendering.NodeRenderers
Assembly
FlowGraph.Avalonia.dll

Renders a numeric input node. Value persisted in Node.Data as double.

public class NumberInputNodeRenderer : DataNodeRendererBase, IEditableNodeRenderer, IDataNodeRenderer, INodeRenderer

Creates the visual with data binding context.

public override Control CreateDataBoundVisual(Node node, INodeProcessor? processor, NodeRenderContext context)

Parameters

node Node

The node to render.

processor INodeProcessor

The node's data processor (may be null for display-only nodes).

context NodeRenderContext

The render context.

Returns

A control bound to the node's data.
